4.4 Debugging interface: the Debug structure

4.4.1 The Debug structure

structure Debug:
  sig
    val clear: ('a -> 'b) -> unit
    val clearAll: unit -> unit
    val info: ('a -> 'b) -> string
    val infoAll: unit -> string list
    val status: ('a -> 'b) -> bool
    val stepThrough: ('a -> 'b) -> 'a -> 'b
  end
clear
clearAll
info
infoAll
status
stepThrough
